title: An essay concerning the power of the magistrate, and the rights of mankind in matters of religion with some reasons in particular for the dissenters not being obliged to take the Sacramental Test but in their own churches, and for a general naturalization : together with a postscript in answer to the Letter to a convocation-man.
author: Tindal, Matthew, 1653?-1733.
publisher: Printed by J.D. for Andrew Bell,
notes: Attributed to Matthew Tindal. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
A letter to a convocation-man was written by Sir Bartholomew Shower.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
